mapper.insert: insert into travel values(travel_seq.nextval, #{sname}, #{tname}, #{cate}, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{taddr}, #{manager, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contact, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select * from travel order by sname asc
select * from travel where sname = #{sname} order by tname asc
mapper.update: update travel set sname=#{sname}, tname=#{tname}, cate=#{cate}, lat=#{lat}, lng=#{lng}, taddr=#{taddr}, manager=#{manager, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact=#{contact, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detail=#{detail, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where tid=#{tid}
mapper.select: select * from travel left join tcomments on travel.tid = tcomments.trano where tname = #{tname} order by commentno asc
mapper.update: update tcomments set tracomment=#{tracomment}, trascore=#{trascore} where commentno=#{commentno}
